http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv-community.gif http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif ANTEQUEERIANS List ANTEQUEERIANS List Archives https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ANTEQUEERIANS&v=ATOM1.0
This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ANTEQUEERIANS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-02-03T16:33:27Z Charlotte Anderson 2015-02-03T16:33:00+00:00 2015-02-03T16:33:00+00:00 Arresting Dress: Cross-Dressing, Law and Fascination in Nineteenth-Century San Francisco https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;1025ae20.1502 Dear ANTEQUEERIANS Subscribers,<br><br>We hope the following title will be of interest to you. With apologies for cross-posting.<br><br>[cid:image002.jpg@01D03FCF.12C3DAF0]<http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/arresting-dress>Arresting Dress<http://www.combinedacademic.co.uk/arresting-dress><br><br>Cross-Dressing, Law, and Fascination in Nineteenth-Century San Francisco<br>Clare Sears<br>"Arresting Dress is an outstanding archivally based and theoretically potent intervention in transgender history. Clare Sears offers fresh insight into how individuals targeted by cross-dressing law manipulated gender boundary logics to make public claims or evade unwelcome scrutiny. Clearly written, vividly documented, and vigorously argued, this book explores how policing gender conformity had far-reaching impacts."- Nayan Shah, author of Stranger Intimacy: Contesting Race, Sexuality, and the Law in the North [...] Lindsay, John M 2015-01-20T18:02:29+00:00 2015-01-20T18:02:29+00:00 Virgil's experience https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;f5dde646.1501 ?Jenkyns reworks arcadia in the opposition of the art history universe, but leaves untouched the pastoral<br><br>my formosem pastor #formosempastor left me the matter of how to update with material as I find it, so using the tag.<br><br>The pastoral was a bishop's letter, so the pastoral becomes an attack on clericism? [...] Lindsay, John M 2015-01-16T15:50:43+00:00 2015-01-16T15:50:43+00:00 Orrells https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;4b2180d0.1501 ?Classical reception gets us to 152J3 for masculinity and modern but the text appears to deal with neither. There is a useful bibliography which is worth working through and building a knowbot.<br><br>John Lindsay<br>Reader in Information Systems Design<br>Kingston University,<br>Kingston Upon Thames,<br>London.<br><br>This email has been scanned for all viruses by the MessageLabs Email Lindsay, John M 2015-01-14T15:09:37+00:00 2015-01-14T15:09:37+00:00 IJGL https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;9aed3488.1501 ?here is something I didn't know about<br><br>http://exitinterview.biz/rarities/ijglfull.htm#ijgl2<br><br>John Lindsay<br>Reader in Information Systems Design<br>Kingston University,<br>Kingston Upon Thames,<br>London.<br><br>This email has been scanned for all viruses by the MessageLabs Email Lindsay, John M 2015-01-12T18:00:05+00:00 2015-01-12T18:00:05+00:00 Flaceliere https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;87429898.1501 This is 152J3.. I think I'm taking out .<br><br>Was French in 1960, translated to English 1962 so now we can build some nice tables. Could do with knowing something about him so will begin to check.<br><br>The title in English is Love.<br><br>John Lindsay<br>Reader in Information Systems Design<br>Kingston University,<br>Kingston Upon Thames,<br>London.<br><br>This email has been scanned for all viruses by the MessageLabs Email<br>Security System. Lindsay, John M 2015-01-12T17:57:35+00:00 2015-01-12T17:57:35+00:00 Panofsky Idea, 1924 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;63ae58fb.1501 This text translated into English and published 1968.<br><br>Subtitle, A concept in Art Theory.<br><br>But what is the concept, apart from Idea?<br><br>Tucked away at the back in an appendix, is Ficino on symposium, I'm begining to hear Duck Quack #DuckQuack, plus there is Durer and Michelangelo and a bit of a give away, M on beloved. [...] Lindsay, John M 2015-01-05T17:19:09+00:00 2015-01-05T17:19:09+00:00 Re: #deceptiontheory https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANTEQUEERIANS;732a46e4.1501 ?I've not found replying to messages to work in the past but different jiscmail seems to work in different mode...<br><br>I've found the 2005 stuff on infopolecon on wordpress working, so given it is ten years on, need to make some annotations, but then that failed so perhaps I'll have to do it here.
